summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York congratulating recipients and requesting to connect by phone to discuss preparations for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The email seeks to 'pick your brains' regarding the upcoming trial.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the upcoming trial being prepared for by the Assistant United States Attorney.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial Preparation
events.description: The Assistant United States Attorney is preparing for the trial of Ghislaine Maxwell and is reaching out to connect with others to discuss the case.

locations.name: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
locations.address: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007

keyFacts: The email is from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The purpose is to connect with recipients to discuss preparations for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The email is dated September 29, 2021, during the period leading up to Maxwell's trial.
The sender's contact information includes the office address and telephone number.
